GSD.description:
binder: fix UAF of ref->proc caused by race condition

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.66 by commit c2a4b5dc8fa71af73bab704d0cac42ac39767ed6. For more details please see the references link.
